website_summaries.verdict: Overall performance comparable to units that cost 3 times the retail price. Great for beginner and expert woodworkers alike. Invest in a dust collection system for better results.
pros: 10-inch table saw is extremely powerful, cuts through thick hardwood
cons: Assembly may require additional holes and adjustments

customer_reviews.title: Too much adjusting and aligning required to make this a workable saw
customer_reviews.text: W1820. Too many things to align and adjust. Instructions are hard to understand. Pictures are black and white and do not help. This cannot be put together well by one person. Pain in the... The extension table is kind of cheap. Even the ruler has to be aligned and glued onto the bar. Contacted seller through Amazon messaging and got no response. (edit- got a response after I posted a bad review) I expected a better product and better service after paying this price for an item. Thus, the low rating. I have had this item for several days now, and still have not gotten to a point where I can power it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Solid and accurate product! Consistent results!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing piece of equipment! No matter if you are a hobbyist or custom builder this saw will handle it! Does Everything with ease and consistent accuracy. Fairly easy to assemble, quiet, and solid. Highly recommend. I liked mine so much i bought one for my Dad. And i will mention that unlike some of the other Shop Fox machinery I've purchased (band saws), the table saw was packaged perfect - no issues at all on either one.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been happy with this saw so far. The motor is plenty powerful and it cuts great. I set the saw up on my own which wasn't easy but it can be done. Definitely take the time to go through all the recommended adjustments to true up the saw, well worth the time spent. I also purchased the mobile base and extension and this saw is easy to move around my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Norris

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love my saw. It cuts accurately. It has a powerful motor. Get either a Grizzly or Shopfox crawler style mobile base, though. For this particular saw I recommend getting the extension to the crawler. Try to have help when you assemble the saw, it's heavy.
customer_reviews.author: dffswv

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the saw. It works very well. All settings were accurate when it arrived except one. I am going to need to do some grinding on the miter square. I cannot adjust it for an accurate 90 degree positive stop. I need to enlarge the hole in the shaft to be able to get the correct adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the saw for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The saw took awhile to get delivered. When it did the delivery guy did a great job. All the parts were there and no real damages. The shop fox emblem had a screw missing but was no problem to fix. I assembled the entire saw by myself in a couple hours. The tables aligned flush with no shims. If you plan on moving it at all get the roller base with it. The saw is very heavy and it helps to move it and raises it a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Hall

customer_reviews.title: My last tablesaw, hopefully. Set up was clean ...
customer_reviews.text: My last tablesaw, hopefully. Set up was clean and smooth. Definatly get help setting on a moveable base. I used a coffin-hoist so it went smooth. Saw is a big improvement over my tired old Craftsman contractor saw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love my saw
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a Grizzly and UPS kept missing delivery appointments so I finally refused it. Glad I did because I really like my Shop Fox. The adjustments are smooth as silk and I really like the fence. Setup was fairly simple and aligning the fence was child's play. I give Amazon five stars for professional delivery as scheduled.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Lord

customer_reviews.title: Overall, the table saw seems solid. However, ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the table saw seems solid. However, the fence is a POS. Massive amounts of deflection when clamping plus Mickey Mouse setup to get parallel with saw blade. Set screws are a joke and rail system is poorly machined. Contacted Fox Shop CS but have not returned my call after 4 hours. This thing should be golden coming straight from the manufacturer with the amount of money they charge. C'mon Fox Shop your engineering standards are certainly suffering when you ship out this fence system. Will try to get a replacement but may have to invest in a reputable fence system.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hazelton

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: excellent high quality machine, quick and simple assembly, machine already adjusted the price of quality, I recommend this saw to you
customer_reviews.author: Tesson

customer_reviews.title: I Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great price, Great Table Saw. It's awesome how quiet it is!
customer_reviews.author: SoCalSaint

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, fit and finish; a very good machine. Delivery was as promised. User manual was clear and easy to follow. Adjustments from the factory were almost right on the money. I highly recommend this saw!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Booth

customer_reviews.title: GREAT...
customer_reviews.text: JUST FINISH ASSEMBLYING IT...NEED TO GET ELECTRICAL GOING...BUT OTHER THAN THAT IS GREAT...I WAS LOOKING AT THE GRIZZLY BUT I THINK THIS WAS BETTER
customer_reviews.author: JONMARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the saw much yet. However, the engineering and construction are top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with Shop Fox W1820
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the Shop fox W1820! I've owned two other saws and have purchased this as (hopefully) my last saw. So far it performs great, set-up was reasonably easy as long as you're paying attention to what you're doing. (I assume you would be if you're spending this much). I've found that it stays dialed in once you've done it, It has no power issues (cuts 2" hardwood w/o issue) and is intuitive to use. My shipment was compromised when it arrived, but after a phone call all of my parts were sent. No problems or questions. I've used it for about two weeks now and haven't don't have buyer's remorse. I would suggest it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice saw.  Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, powerful saw with a heavy duty table and rip fence. I replaced and old Craftsman with this, and it made huge difference. I also got the table extension and mobile base. The extension is a bit of a pain to get installed, but not enough to deduct a star. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Northrup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: After dealing with a very unreliable company, I found this table saw for a great price. It was shipped with no problems and no damages! Very happy with this saw and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Missy W.

customer_reviews.title: shop fox w1820 3 hp 10-inch table saw with extension table and riving knife
customer_reviews.text: very good saw after reading about other table saw products I got this 2 years ago for a good deal while it was on sale with free shipping very happy with it. very heavy saw.Dilivery guy was nice and helpful with a little of help I was able to put it together lots of power stable passed the nickel test no problem fence is very good dust port some what high and the blade was cheep but that does not matter I have no problem with the extension table easy to adjust and tune the saw I built a base out of 4x4 to raise the saw up. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: woodworker

customer_reviews.title: and I have to say it is the best saw I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have used this saw for over a year now, and I have to say it is the best saw I have ever owned. It is very smooth and it cuts just like you set it up to cut. . The only one bad thing I have to say is it is hard to crank the saw up after you have use it a little. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki W.

customer_reviews.title: great so far
customer_reviews.text: this came and was easy to off load no damage just heavy looks lik a great saw and value for the money
customer_reviews.author: alex cassulo

customer_reviews.title: Motor Burnt Up
customer_reviews.text: The 3 hp motor burnt up last week. The saw was purchased in 2012 and has been used very little. The replacement motor is $650. I had trouble with the motor a couple years ago and had to install and new start capacitor. The saw performs well with little vibration but the Leeson 3hp motor is not reliable. I would contact the manufacture but having a hard time doing so. Dan Signed: Disappointed in Central Illinois
customer_reviews.author: Dan McClenning

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the saw six months ago from Amazon. Delivery was perfect; the driver brought the cartons into the garage without my asking. Assembly probably took me longer than it should have, but this was my first table saw, so I took my time to understand everything before I started. The only really difficult part was getting it onto the undercarriage by myself. Got it set up in due time, and it worked flawlessly from the beginning. I have cut 8/4 hard maple and beech with no problem. The saw has plenty of power to handle anything I needed. I would recommend this saw (or the Grizzly equivalent) to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: rchapman

product_meta.title: Shop Fox W1820 3 HP 10-Inch Table Saw with Extension Table and Riving Knife
product_meta.description: Style:3 HP 49 in. rip capacityEvery part of this saw says quality and performance. From the heavy cast-iron trunnions, 3 HP motor and triple belt drive to the massive cast-iron table and wings, this table saw is built to last a lifetime. You'll also appreciate the cam lock T-fence, riving knife, heavy cast handwheels, magnetic switch, T-slot miter gauge with fence extension and flip stop and 4-inch dust collection port. A true riving knife follows the up and down and tilt movement of the blade. Features an extra 50-inch rip capacity, more than enough to rip to the center of a standard sheet of plywood, long extension table with adjustable legs, square steel tubing frame and dimensionally-stable top.
feature_bullets: Item may ship in more than one box and may arrive separately
Precision ground and polished cast iron table and wings and massive cast iron trunnions
Quick release riving knife, blade guard and splitter assembly
Wide span easy glide T-fence system with positive camlock and phenolic face and smooth gliding nylon runners
Adjustable T-slot miter gauge with anodized fence extension and flip stop
Magnetic switch with thermal overload protection

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
